attributes.action: sue speculatiors for the repayment of expenses to the taxpayer for failed legal investigations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that where people use the legal system to test their personal theories about tragedies they should be required to make good the costs to the state if their claims are proved to be false.  For example, a grieving parent wishing to prove a national conspiracy to cause the death of their child despite previous inquiries should only be allowed further investigation at their own cost.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
